artist: Artist: Jennifer Camper; Publisher: Jennifer Camper
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, image of two figures printed in offset lithography on decal, which is adhered to the front of mirror-like covers; 12 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink pen: To FLY - / Hang on TIGHT --- / (signed Jennifer Camper)
title: Hold On
